title: fix: add bedrock throttling exception to retries for evals

body: > [!IMPORTANT] > Add `ThrottlingException` handling to `callStructuredLLM` in `utilities.ts` for retry logic. > > - **Behavior**: > - In `callStructuredLLM` in `utilities.ts`, add `ThrottlingException` to exceptions that trigger an `ApiError` with status 429. > - Previously only `InsufficientQuotaError` was handled this way. > > This description was created by [](https://www.ellipsis.dev?ref=langfuse%2Flangfuse&utm_source=github&utm_medium=referral) for 56751ac43b3d8c16f36bb643f2b3daa173460f62. It will automatically update as commits are pushed.
